revised_title: Donald Broadbent: A Pioneer of Information Processing in Psychology
tldr: Donald Broadbent was a British psychologist who revolutionized the field of psychology by introducing an information processing approach to study attention, decision-making, memory, and control. His work had a significant impact on the development of cognitive psychology and human factors. Broadbent's research focused on practical problems of equipment design in relation to human usage, and he made important contributions to the understanding of human performance under various conditions.
